plot: Allison has visions of what her life would be if she had become a high-powered attorney and married someone other than Joe.

Allison dreams of a alternate life, one where she marries someone other than Joe - who happens to be quite handsome --- and where she successfully completes law school becoming a high-profile attorney. In her waking life at work, she is assisting DA Devalos who is trying to convict Sean Redburn who lured a pretty young woman to the U.S. and proceeded to abuse and kill her. The DA hasn't been able to find the victim's body however and the defense has --- in the form of the 'victim' herself, alive and well. As a result, Devalos feels he and Allison can no longer work together. As her dreams continue, Allison finds herself acting as Redburn's attorney and Joe is a potential expert witness in the case.—garykmcd
